settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.title: Avoid Allergic Reactions
settings.text: Table & Twine’s allergy-friendly meal kits make dinnertime enjoyable – not stressful. Since our chefs thoughtfully develop these recipes, you don’t need to worry about uncomfortable symptoms like coughing or digestive upset.

settings.title: Eliminate Time-Consuming Label Examination
settings.text: Whether you have a serious nut allergy or a mild gluten sensitivity, you likely spend loads of time reading nutrition labels. Fortunately, when you order an allergy-friendly meal kit from Table & Twine, you can simply untwine and dine.

settings.title: Everyone Can Eat at the Same Time
settings.text: All Table & Twine meals – allergy-friendly or not – can be prepared in 15 minutes or less. That means even if you order a different dish from your wife and kids, you can all start eating in just 15 minutes.

settings.section_heading: Why Choose an Allergy-Friendly Meal Kit in Charlotte?
settings.text: Our talented chefs have developed a variety of allergy-friendly meals that are delicious and convenient. Since these dishes are easy to prepare and come in single-serving portions, you can enjoy a meal with the rest of your family. Other benefits of allergy-friendly meal kits include:

Exciting Dishes to Celebrate Dad: This Father’s Day, Table & Twine is here to help make a polished meal that will impress your loved ones. Our chefs help you create the final dishes by planning, sourcing, and prepping ingredients. Enjoy a unique, high-quality menu without being overwhelmed by complicated recipes.

Quick Preparation & Even Quicker Cleanup: With Table & Twine, you will enjoy the satisfaction of creating a delicious meal without the stress of grocery shopping and meal preparation. We take care of the hard part so you can spend more time celebrating dad. Even better, our meal kits are designed to minimize cleanup.

Thoughtful Meals from Chefs Who Care: The dedicated chefs at Table & Twine truly care about making a unique dining experience this Father’s Day. Enjoy carefully selected fresh ingredients and a specially curated menu. Our meal kits are intentionally designed to bring your family together over a delicious meal.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: Why Choose a Father’s Day Meal Kit?
settings.text2: At Table & Twine, we are dedicated to providing a delicious and convenient meal for your family. Some benefits of ordering our Father’s Day meal kit include:

settings.title: How Much Time Is Required to Prepare the Food in My Father’s Day Meal Kit?
settings.text: Your Table & Twine meal kit can be prepared in under two hours, requiring a few simple steps to bring out flavors and add a personal touch. Each Father’s Day package is designed to minimize time in the kitchen.

settings.title: How Far in Advance Do I Need to Order My Father’s Day Meal Kit?
settings.text: Order your Father’s Day meal kit by June 10th to ensure it will arrive on time. Afterwards, sit back and relax while we take care of the planning, sourcing, and prep-work.

settings.title: Can I Customize My Father’s Day Meal Kit?
settings.text: No, the Father’s Day meal kits cannot be customized. Our experienced chefs intentionally limit the menu to provide the best combination of flavors. Even with picky kids, there will be something for everyone!

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
